## MIN_TX_FEE

-   **See: [https://github.com/dogecoin/dogecoin/blob/master/src/validation.h#L58][1]
    **

Minimum transaction fee
100000 satoshi/kB (similar to current `minrelaytxfee`)

Chain identifier for Dogecoin
